description:
Rank Your Kindle Books With Ease

This course will show how I ranked TWO eBooks within ONE week using some very simple techniques which anyone can use to rank their books.

Amazon has a special algorithm which can be used to your advantage when you understand what it looks for in a potential Best Seller!

This course shows you how I built an infrastucture that can generate Kindle best-sellers on demand. If you don't have an infrastucture on place it can be hard to rank your books on Amazon.

Learn how I do it and how you can replicate my success in this illuminating Case-Study.

Even though this course is short and very low cost, it is worth gold, so make sure you watch the videos and Take Massive Action.

All the Best

LR Thomas
title: Kindle:Kindle Book Blastoff
